data.title: Confessionalization in Europe, 1555–1700: Essays in Honor and Memory of Bodo Nischan 2003064041, 9780754637448, 9781315259673
data.meta_description: Confessionalization in Europe, 1555-1700 brings together a closely-focused set of essays by leading scholars from the US...
